movie_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
title: Worth watching!
review: Not your average coming-of-age teen movie!Stephen Chbosky's novel 'The Perks of Being a Wallflower' marks malls and search engine results even before it was released. The trailer alone is already making a buzz in and around the media. Emma Watson's face caught my attention at first glance on it aside from the apple green background.Since it is an adaptation, I find it quite rare to hear good reviews from people who have read the novel. It is about 15-year-old Charlie, an endearing and naive outsider, coping with first love Sam, the suicide of his best friend, and his own mental illness while struggling to find a group of people with whom he belongs.
